  • Method Details

    • performUpdate

      protected static void performUpdate()

      Method: performUpdate()

      Description: This method opens the user update dialog to allow the current user to update their account settings.

    • performLogout

      protected static void performLogout()

      Method: performLogout()

      Description: This method logs out the current user and proceeds to the normal login page where existing users can log in or potential new users with a invitation code can start the process of setting up an account.

    • performQuit

      protected static void performQuit()

      Method: performQuit()

      Description: This method terminates the execution of the program. It leaves the database in a state where the normal login page will be displayed when the application is restarted.

    • handleLoadPosts

      protected static entityClasses.PostList handleLoadPosts(String currentThread, String currentSearchText)

      Method: handleLoadPosts(String currentThread, String currentSearchText)

      *

      Description: Calls the Model to grab the filtered and searched posts and passes them back to the View for display when called.

      * @param currentThread The current thread filter.
      Parameters:
      currentSearchText - The current text filter.
      Returns:
      A PostList of filtered and sorted posts.
      See Also:
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsByThread()
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsWithSearch()
